titles.title: Relating to a national emergency declared by the President on September 8, 2005.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: MOTION TO DISCHARGE COMMITTEE - Mr. George Miller of California moved that the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure be discharged from further consideration of H.J. Res. 69.
MOTION TO TABLE MOTION TO DISCHARGE - Mr. Kildee moved to lay the motion to discharge H.J. Res. 69 on the table. Agreed to without objection.

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 10/20/2005--Introduced. Declares that the national emergency declared by the finding of the President on September 8, 2005, in Proclamation 7924 is hereby terminated.
